column1: On [[3 August]] [[1965]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
column2: a letter]] to The Librarian at Marquette'''.<ref name=Marq>{{webcite
column5: articlename=J.R.R. Tolkien Collection: Other Tolkien Writings, 1911-1976

column1: *'''Subject:''' Tolkien is seeking photostatic copies of items needed for the revision of ''The Lord of the Rings''.
*'''Archive:''' The original letter is kept at [[Marquette University]].<ref name=Marq/>
